original_name: Syria conflict 'Chemical attacks' near Damascus
overview:
Chemical weapons attacks have killed dozens on the outskirts of Damascus, Syrian opposition activists claim....

original_name: Edward Snowden files No 10 contacted Guardian
overview:
David Cameron ordered Britain's most senior civil servant to contact the Guardian over classified information leaked by the whistle-blower Edward Snowden, it has emerged.....
